name: PAX_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure for a list of passengers, each with a unique PaxID, a PTC (Passenger Type Code), and personal details. Includes hierarchical relationships via PaxRefID, which references another PaxID within the same list.
prompt: Verify that each <Pax> in <PaxList> has a unique <PaxID>, a valid <PTC>, and an <Individual> with required child elements. Ensure that <PaxRefID>, if present, references a valid <PaxID> within the same list.
